Html:
First off this control is fantastic and I know this has to be my fault.
I create a route in side a list. Say A to B to C.
The user can drag item C to item B position then submit route.
This works but when I pan or zoom, the original route lines persists.

How do I Remove or alter a route and remove previous route lines?
I appreciate any help.
 Dim rp As RoutingProvider = TryCast(MyMap.MapProvider, RoutingProvider)
        If rp Is Nothing Then
            rp = GMapProviders.OpenStreetMap
        End If
        For i = 1 To ListViewListRouter.Items.Count - 1
'skips first item it is always the same
            ToolTipAddress = RouteList(i).Address
'the lng and lat in observable collection called "Routelist"
            Dim StartLat As Double = RouteList(i).Lat
            Dim StartLon As Double = RouteList(i).Lon
 'imcrement variable for custom marker image
            ListViewListRouterCount = i
 'create the marker
            Dim CurrentMarker = New GMapMarker(New PointLatLng(StartLat, StartLon))
            CurrentMarker.ZIndex = 1
            CurrentMarker.Shape = (New CustomMarker(Me, CurrentMarker, ""))
            CurrentMarker.Offset = New System.Windows.Point(-15, -15)
            MyMap.Markers.Add(CurrentMarker)

'Create the Route
If RdBtnTurnByTurn.IsChecked Then
                Dim Shop As New PointLatLng(47.7055669670551, -117.348280549049)
                If i = 1 Then
                    Dim route As MapRoute = rp.GetRoute(Shop, CurrentMarker.Position, False, False, CInt(MyMap.Zoom))
                    If route IsNot Nothing Then
                        Dim mRoute As New GMapRoute(route.Points)
                        mRoute.RegenerateShape(MyMap)
                        TryCast(mRoute.Shape, System.Windows.Shapes.Path).Stroke = Brushes.DarkViolet
                        If True Then
                            mRoute.ZIndex = 5
                        End If
                        MyMap.Markers.Add(mRoute)
                      End If
                Else
                    Dim PreviousPoint As New PointLatLng(RouteList(i - 1).Lat, RouteList(i - 1).Lon)
                    Dim route As MapRoute = rp.GetRoute(PreviousPoint, CurrentMarker.Position, False, False, CInt(MyMap.Zoom))
                    If route IsNot Nothing Then
                        Dim mRoute As New GMapRoute(route.Points)
                        mRoute.RegenerateShape(MyMap)
                        TryCast(mRoute.Shape, System.Windows.Shapes.Path).Stroke = Brushes.DarkViolet
                        If True Then
                            mRoute.ZIndex = 5
                        End If
                        MyMap.Markers.Add(mRoute)
                        ' MyMap.ZoomAndCenterMarkers(Nothing)
                    End If
                End If
            End If
Next
